TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XpsDigitalSignature extends System.Object

span.span: Represents a digital signature for an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用而非當您使用[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]文件。Use instead of when you work with an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document. 不是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]-了解，並不保證所有組件中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]文件會完整簽署。 is not [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]-aware, and does not guarantee that all parts in an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document are fully signed. 如需有關數位簽章的詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN 文章*Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions*網址[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494 ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494)。For more information about digital signatures, see the MSDN article *Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions* available at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494). 如需詳細資訊[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]請參閱 < *XML Paper Specification (XPS)* 下載[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761 ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)。For more information about [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] see the *XML Paper Specification (XPS)* available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).

summary.span: 取得值，指示變更文件的屬性，是否會使數位簽章失效。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether changing the properties of the document invalidates the digital signature.

value.span: 如果變更文件的屬性會使簽章失效，則為 ，否則為 。

public: property Nullable<Guid> Id { Nullable<Guid> get(); };

summary.span: 取得簽章的全域唯一識別碼 (GUID)。

span.span: Gets the globally unique identifier (GUID) of the signature.
The GUID of the signature.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來顯示和更新簽章資訊。The following example shows how to use the property to display and update signature information. [!code-csharp[XpsReadWriteSign#IterateSignatureDefinitions](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsReadWriteSign/CSharp/SignatureDefinitionsAndSigning.cs#iteratesignaturedefinitions)] [!code-vb[XpsReadWriteSign#IterateSignatureDefinitions](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsReadWriteSign/visualbasic/signaturedefinitionsandsigning.vb#iteratesignaturedefinitions)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsCertificateAvailable As Boolean
public: property bool IsCertificateAvailable { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得指出文件 中是否包含簽署者之 X.509 憑證的值。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the signer's X.509 certificate is contained in the document .

value.span: 如果簽署者的 X.509 憑證內嵌在文件 中，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the X.509 certificate of the signer is embedded in the document ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 簽署者的 X.509 憑證內嵌方法的呼叫時`embedCertificate`參數設為`true`。The X.509 certificate of the signer is embedded by the method when called with the `embedCertificate` parameter set to `true`. 如需有關數位簽章和憑證的詳細資訊，請參閱區段 3.3 數位簽章中*Open Packaging Conventions*規格可以從下載。For more information on digital signatures and certificates, see Section 3.3 Digital Signatures in the *Open Packaging Conventions* specification available for download at .

related.span: Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions

span.span: Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SignatureOriginRestricted As Boolean
public: property bool SignatureOriginRestricted { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指示有其他人簽署封裝時，是否會使數位簽章失效。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the digital signature is invalidated if someone else signs the package.

value.span: 如果套用其他的數位簽章會使簽章失效，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the signature is invalidated if an additional digital signature is applied; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定簽章原點限制方法的呼叫時`restrictions`參數設定為排除組件。The signature origin restriction is set by the method when called with the `restrictions` parameter set to exclude the part. 如果文件是由一個以上的人，簽署組件必須先簽署文件時，要排除的簽章。If a document is to be signed by more than one person, the part needs to be excluded from the signature when the document is first signed. (排除項目中指定`restrictions`參數呼叫。)如果的組件不在排除、 任何其他的簽章失效的第一個的簽署者的簽章。(Exclusions are specified in the `restrictions` parameter of the call to .) If the part is not excluded, any additional signatures invalidate the signature of the first signer. 如需有關的核心屬性和簽章原點組件的詳細資訊，請參閱第 3 章*Open Packaging Conventions*規格可以從下載。For more information on the Core Properties and Signature Origin parts, see Chapter 3 of the *Open Packaging Conventions* specification available for download at .

related.span: Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions

The default signature type is .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SignerCertificate As X509Certificate

summary.span: 取得簽署者的 X.509 憑證。

span.span: Gets the X.509 certificate of the signer.

value.span: 簽署者的 X.509 憑證，或是當沒有憑證內嵌在文件封裝中時則為 。

span.span: The X.509 certificate of the signer; or when there is no certificate embedded in the document package.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 簽署者的 X.509 憑證內嵌方法的呼叫時`embedCertificate`參數設為`true`。The X.509 certificate of the signer is embedded by the method when called with the `embedCertificate` parameter set to `true`. 如需有關數位簽章和憑證的詳細資訊，請參閱區段 3.3 數位簽章中*Open Packaging Conventions*規格可以從下載。For more information on digital signatures and certificates, see Section 3.3 Digital Signatures in the *Open Packaging Conventions* specification available for download at .

span.span: Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SigningTime As DateTime
public: property DateTime SigningTime { DateTime get(); };

summary.span: 取得簽章建立時的日期與時間。

span.span: Gets the date and time when the signature was created.

value.span: 頁面、文件或文件序列簽署時的日期和時間。

span.span: The date and time when the pages, document, or document sequence was signed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是會根據其中的簽章發生在電腦的系統時間。 is based on the system time of the computer where the signing took place. 不是 「 安全時間戳記 」 並不是來自受信任的時間戳記授權單位。 is not a "secure Time Stamp" and is not from trusted Time Stamp Authority. 安全時間戳記必須取得並套用到受信任的時間戳記授權單位。A secure TimeStamp must be obtained and applied through a trusted Time Stamp Authority.

related.span: Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions

span.span: Verifies the document digital signature against an X.509 certificate.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult Verify() cil managed

summary.span: 根據 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] 內嵌的 X.509 憑證驗證文件數位簽章。

span.span: Verifies the document digital signature against the X.509 certificate embedded in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] .

returns.span: 指定驗證嘗試結果之其中一個 列舉值。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specify the result of the verification attempt.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個多載方法驗證文件數位簽章所內嵌的 X.509 憑證方法的呼叫時`embedCertificate`參數設為`true`。This overload method verifies the document digital signature against the X.509 certificate embedded by the method when called with the `embedCertificate` parameter set to `true`.

related.span: Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions

span.span: Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult Verify(class System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate certificate) cil managed
Public Function Verify (certificate As X509Certificate) As VerifyResult

span.span: The certificate of authenticity for the signer.

summary.span: 根據指定的 X.509 憑證驗證文件數位簽章。

span.span: Verifies the document digital signature against a specified X.509 certificate.

returns.span: 指定驗證嘗試結果之其中一個 列舉值。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specify the result of the verification attempt.

related.span: Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions

span.span: Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions
Verifies an X.509 certificate.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainStatusFlags VerifyCertificate() cil managed

summary.span: 驗證內嵌在封裝中的 X.509 憑證。

span.span: Verifies the X.509 certificate embedded in the package.

returns.span: 指定驗證嘗試結果之列舉值的位元組合。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specify the result of the verification attempt.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您的應用程式必須決定哪些旗標是很重要的驗證憑證。Your application will need to decide what flags are critical for verifying certificates. 某些憑證的驗證可能需要透過網際網路連線。Some certificate verifications may require Internet connectivity. 簽署者的 X.509 憑證內嵌方法的呼叫時`embedCertificate`參數設為`true`。The X.509 certificate of the signer is embedded by the method when called with the `embedCertificate` parameter set to `true`.

related.span: Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions

span.span: Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainStatusFlags VerifyCertificate(class System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate certificate) cil managed
Public Shared Function VerifyCertificate (certificate As X509Certificate) As X509ChainStatusFlags

span.span: A certificate of authenticity.

summary.span: 驗證指定的 X.509 憑證。

span.span: Verifies the specified X.509 certificate.

returns.span: 指定驗證嘗試結果之列舉值的位元組合。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specify the result of the verification attempt.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您的應用程式必須決定哪些旗標是很重要的驗證憑證。Your application will need to decide what flags are critical for verifying certificates. 某些憑證的驗證可能需要透過網際網路連線。Some certificate verifications may require Internet connectivity.
